name: PUML Better Health
description: PUML Better Health is a DApp and global fitness currency that enables corporates, brands and sports clubs to reward members for being active and healthy. The DApp Gamifies health and fitness challenges and encourages members to be more active and to compete with friends, family and the global community. Challenges include daily/weekly/monthly steps, runs, workouts, heart rate, sleep and more. The platform uses EOSIO to protect wearable and fitness data and allows members to earn revenue from sharing their health data. It also provide an opportunity to earn coin through staking and completing healthy behaviours over predefined time periods.
